roleset.name: accumulate, gather
roleset.note: ACCRUE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls obtain-13.5.2. (from accrue.01-v)

example.name: agentive, with rate
example.text: The El Paso, Texas, maker of Western boots and leather accessories said the preferred stock would accrue dividends at a 12% rate, but wouldn't be paid for the first two years.

example.name: ergative, sorta
example.text: Geoffrey Kalmus said that unsecured creditors would be paid in full credits and [interest of about $855 million]-1, accrued *trace*-1 before PS of New Hampshire's Jan. 1988 filing for bankruptcy court protection.
example.arg: before PS of New Hampshire's Jan. 1988 filing for bankruptcy court protection
